Module.Name: medical-graphrag-assistant
Module.Description: A production-ready medical AI assistant platform built on MCP, featuring GraphRAG multi-modal search, FHIR integration, and NVIDIA NIM embeddings.
Module.Keywords: python, fhir, rag, graphrag, mcp, nvidia, nim, ai, medical

Author.Notes: Requires InterSystems IRIS 2021.2+ for Embedded Python and Vector Search support.

Invoke.Arg: import sys, os; sys.path.append('${installdir}'); from src.cli.__main__ import fix_environment_command; fix_environment_command(type('Args', (), {})())
